00039 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_LESS_H
00040 #define CONSTRAINT_LESS_H
00041 
00042 // x <= y + offset
00043 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename Offset>
00044 struct LeqConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00045 {
00046   virtual string constraint_name()
00047   { return "Leq"; }
00048   
00049   //typedef BoolLessSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00050   const Offset offset;
00051   VarRef1 x;
00052   VarRef2 y;
00053   
00054   LeqConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj,VarRef1 _x, VarRef2 _y, Offset _o) :
00055     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), offset(_o), x(_x), y(_y)
00056   { }
00057   
00058   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00059   {
00060     triggerCollection t;
00061     t.push_back(make_trigger(x, Trigger(this, 0), LowerBound));
00062     t.push_back(make_trigger(y, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00063     return t;
00064     
00065   }
00066 
00067   // Needs to be at end of file
00068   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint();
00069   
00070   virtual void propagate(int prop_val,DomainDelta)
00071   {
00072     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(BinaryLeq);
00073     if(prop_val)
00074     {// y changed
00075       x.setMax(y.getMax() + offset);
00076     }
00077     else
00078     {// x changed
00079       y.setMin(x.getMin() - offset);
00080     }
00081   }
00082   
00083   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int,DomainDelta)
00084   { return (x.getMin() > y.getMax() + offset); }
00085   
00086   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00087   { return (x.getMin() > y.getMax() + offset); }
00088   
00089   virtual void full_propagate()
00090   {
00091     propagate(0,0);
00092     propagate(1,0);
00093   }
00094   
00095   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00096   {
00097     D_ASSERT(v_size == 2);
00098     return v[0] <= (v[1] + offset);
00099   }
00100   
00101   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00102   {
00103     int x_min = x.getMin();
00104     int y_max = y.getMax();
00105     
00106     if(x_min <= y_max + offset)
00107     {
00108       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, x_min));
00109       assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, y_max));
00110       return true;
00111     } 
00112     return false;
00113   }
00114   
00115   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00116   { 
00117     vector<AnyVarRef> array;
00118     array.reserve(2);
00119     array.push_back(x);
00120     array.push_back(y);
00121     return array;
00122   }
00123 };
00124 
00125 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename Offset>
00126 AbstractConstraint*
00127 LeqCon(StateObj* stateObj, VarRef1 v1, VarRef2 v2, Offset o)
00128 { return new LeqConstraint<VarRef1,VarRef2,Offset>(stateObj,v1,v2,o); }
00129 
00130 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2>
00131 AbstractConstraint*
00132 LeqCon(StateObj* stateObj,VarRef1 v1, VarRef2 v2)
00133 { return new LeqConstraint<VarRef1,VarRef2,compiletime_val<0> >(stateObj,v1,v2,compiletime_val<0>()); }
00134 
00135 template<typename VarRef>
00136 AbstractConstraint*
00137 ImpliesCon(StateObj* stateObj, VarRef v1, VarRef v2)
00138 { return new LeqConstraint<VarRef,VarRef,compiletime_val<0> >(stateObj,v1,v2,compiletime_val<0>()); }
00139 
00140 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00141 AbstractConstraint*
00142 BuildCT_INEQ(StateObj* stateObj, const T1& t1, const T2& t2, ConstraintBlob& b) 
00143 { return LeqCon(stateObj, t1[0], t2[0], runtime_val(b.constants[0][0])); }
00144 
00145 // This is mainly inline to avoid multiple definitions.
00146 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename Offset>
00147 inline AbstractConstraint* LeqConstraint<VarRef1, VarRef2, Offset>::reverse_constraint()
00148 { return LeqCon(stateObj,y,x, offset.negminusone()); }
00149 
00150 #endif
